headline: Is It Worth Investing in Albemarle (ALB) Based on Wall Street's Bullish Views?

headline: Albemarle Idles Kemerton As Insider Moves Spotlight Cost Discipline And Risks
summary: Albemarle (NYSE:ALB) has idled its Kemerton lithium processing plant in Australia, affecting part of its processing footprint. The company has said that customer demand will be supplied through other channels and that its core mining operations are not impacted. Recent insider selling by the Chief Commercial Officer has drawn attention to leadership actions during a period of industry pressure. Albemarle enters this update with its shares at $186.83 and a 1-year return of 143.2%, alongside...
